## PolicySource type

Source of the embedded policy decision point server's policies.

**Signature:**

```typescript
export type PolicySource = PolicyLoader | PolicyLoaderOptions | Awaitable<ArrayBufferView>;
```
**References:** [PolicyLoader](./embedded-client.policyloader.md)<!-- -->, [PolicyLoaderOptions](./embedded-client.policyloaderoptions.md)<!-- -->, [Awaitable](./core.awaitable.md)

## Remarks

The source may be

- a [`PolicyLoader`](./embedded-client.policyloader.md) (or the [`PolicyLoaderOptions`](./embedded-client.policyloaderoptions.md) to create one) to download policy bundles from Cerbos Hub; or

- the contents of a previously-downloaded policy bundle (or a promise resolving to one).
